code: export var randomizer=function randomizer(array){var newArr=[];var x=array.length;var random=randomArray();for(var i=0;i<x;i++){newArr.push(array[random[i]]);}return newArr;};export var randomArray=function randomArray(){var randomArr=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var random=Math.floor(Math.random()*14);if(randomArr.length===0){randomArr.push(random);}if(randomArr.length>=14)return;for(var x=0;x<randomArr.length;x++){if(randomArr[x]===random){randomArray(randomArr);}}randomArr.push(random);randomArray(randomArr);return randomArr.slice(0,14);};
